title: ESET keys 18.5.11 by Spycops
description:
A new build has been released for ESET NOD32 Antivirus 4 for Mac. Build 4.0.12 includes repairs to known issues that have been found in recent months, as well as improved features and functionality. 

 Key new features include:
Fixed GUI failure that had occurred in some cases during configuration imports
System font warnings no longer display

For more information about ESET NOD32 Antivirus 4 for Mac, visit our ESET NOD32 Antivirus 4 for Mac Beta website.

 For more information or to participate in the beta test programs, visit our beta test portal.
Product/Beta Release
Here are some introduction:
No personal computer exists in a vacuum. As elegantly designed as Macs are, a connected world means that their popularity attracts the attention of malware writers and virus engineers. Not only can malware and other threats attack the Mac OS X platform directly, but Macs can also serve as a carrier of Windows or Linux-based threats. Network shares, email and removable media like USB keys are easy ways easy ways for multiplatform malware to spread under the radar.

The MacÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s meteoric rise in popularity makes the Mac OS X platform more likely to be a target for cybercriminals looking to profit from the perception that Macs are invulnerable to from viruses, worms, trojans and other threats. ESET NOD32 Antivirus 4 for Mac OS X brings to the Mac world protection that Windows users have trusted in and depended on: the smart proactive detection and small footprint of our ThreatSenseÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® technology. ESET NOD32 Antivirus 4 will keep you and your network safe from emerging Mac OS X and cross-platform threats without system slowdowns. Advanced heuristic technology recognizes and nullifies novel threats while other AV solutions are still waiting hours or days for signature updates.
